description: This file defines a Dart class `HealthService` that interacts with a backend API to perform health checks. It retrieves configuration from environment variables, determines platform-specific URLs, and makes HTTP GET requests to verify backend health.

classes.name: HealthService
classes.description: Provides static methods to check the health status of the backend API through HTTP requests, with environment-based URL configuration and platform-specific defaults.

methods.name: baseUrl
methods.description: Retrieves the backend API base URL from environment variable or defaults based on platform (Android or others).

methods.name: checkHealth
methods.description: Performs an HTTP GET request to the backend root to verify health. Parses response message or defaults to 'Healthy'. Throws exception on failure.
